articles.author: Seb Starcevic
articles.title: Netanyahu can attend Auschwitz memorial event, Poland’s Tusk says - POLITICO Europe
articles.description: The Israeli prime minister is subject to an International Criminal Court arrest warrant for war crimes in Gaza.
articles.content: The assurances came after Polands President Andrzej Duda, from the opposition Law and Justice party, this week asked the government to allow Netanyahu to attend the event. Duda wrote to Tusk’sgovernm… [+1230 chars]
